modName: Aurinna Morront - A Standalone Breton Follower
summary: Aurinna Morront is a Breton Follower who has mastered the arts of magic, weapons and music. She resides inside Dragonsreach in Whiterun and will play music on request or come with you on your adventures. She is also marriageable.
descriptionHtml:
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img840.imageshack.us/img840/3889/pu4s.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
This mod is for the latest version of Skyrim. It does not require any other mods (Hence "Standalone").
Install either in Nexus Mod Manager or Manually by placing the files in the correct path in "Data". Do not replace folders if there is existing textures or meshes, only merge the folders.
[color=red][b]Please note that without clothes this mod does contain nudity from CBBE.[/b][/color]
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/3235/0c87.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
About her:
Name: Aurinna Morront
Race: Breton
Class: Spellsword/Bard
Spells: Fast Healing, Heal Other, Firebolt, Ice Spike, Lightning Bolt.
Inventory: Aurinna's Robes, Gloves and Boots (Original is Vampire Bride Outfit), and a Daedric Sword (All Equipped).
Looks/Traits: Has CBBE body (and face textures), Custom hair by NewSea (Converted by MortenHoward), FemaleYoungEager voice type, default weight and height, Essential and Unique (Doesn't die).
Stats: Starts at level 5 and levels with the player until level 250. She is a Combat Spellsword.
Location and speech: She is found inside Dragonsreach in Whiterun. You can request her to play a song, ask her to to become a follower, or ask why she is there. All fully voiced by default Skyrim voice "FemaleYoungEager". You may also marry her normally with the Amulet of Mara.
[URL=http://www.BannerFans.com][IMG]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/4589/se6k.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
This mod was created by Maura (OvercastGirl) with the resources of CBBE, MortenHairs, Vampire Bride Robes, and the major help of Natilde's Standalone NPC tutorial.
author: Maura
